name: The Chapel Theft
description: Silver candlesticks have been stolen from the castle chapel. Captain Aldric has assigned you to investigate.

objectives.description: Investigate the theft by questioning suspects
Find evidence of who committed the theft
Report your findings to Captain Aldric

cover_up.description: You convinced the Captain to cover up Mira's theft

strict_justice.description: You reported Mira and she faced justice

direct_accusation.description: You directly accused Mira without seeking leniency
